nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Sunny, with a high near 93. Heat index values as high as 105. South wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 76. Southwest wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
